<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get room available times"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/{locationRoomId}/available-times"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the weekly availability schedule for a room. Use this to show open/closed hours when scheduling events.

**Prerequisites**
1. **locationRoomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the room ID.
2. Fetch availability: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{locationRoomId\}/available-times](/docs/api/locations/get-location-room-available-times).
3. Use the returned weekly schedule to validate bookings.

**Minimal Required Fields**: locationRoomId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"locationRoomId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the room"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday)"},"WeekdayName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable day name (e.g., 'Monday')"},"IsClosed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is closed/unavailable on this day"},"LocalStartTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Start time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss format)","example":"08:00:00"},"LocalEndTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"End time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss format)","example":"17:00:00"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this availability record has been
